item.title: Love, Death & Robots - A Stunning Anthology
item.description:
First Impressions: Love, Death & Robots

Just started Season 1 of Love, Death & Robots – a visually stunning anthology blending sci-fi, fantasy, and dark humor. Each episode is a self-contained story with unique animation styles, from hyper-realistic CGI to striking hand-drawn art.

Today’s Watchlist:

  • S01E01: Sonnie’s Edge (Brutal monster fights & a killer twist)
  • S01E02: Three Robots (Darkly funny post-apocalyptic tour)
  • S01E03: The Witness (Mind-bending chase in a neon dystopia)

The series’ creativity and unpredictability already have me hooked. Perfect for fans of Black Mirror but with more visceral animation.
